channel.title: Error connecting to server
channel.description:
Guys, help please ! im trying to make a server. I got JDK 6 update 7, I got a hostname, i've downloaded every signle thing you need to make a server and when i try to log into my server with silab soft, it doesn't work, it says Error connecting to server. So if anyone could please help me. I would appreciate that. Thanks.
~Macoronizer

item.title: Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @puffcake puffcake
item.description:
@puffcake wrote:

[quote=“skiller noob1, post:6, topic:228933”][quote author=puffcake link=topic=301072.msg2416516#msg2416516 date=1220149185]
did you put your ip as blank or 127.0.0.1 not your address
[/quote] Blank? It wouldn’t work then, do not mislead people with things you have not yet learned yourself.[/quote]
your a moron when you host a server you can leave the ip address as “blank” which is nothing idk what world you come from but where i am thats what it means

Read full topic

item.description:
@skiller_noob1 wrote:

[quote=“puffcake, post:4, topic:228933”]did you put your ip as blank or 127.0.0.1 not your address[/quote] Blank? It wouldn’t work then, do not mislead people with things you have not yet learned yourself.

item.title: Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @Macoronizer Macoronizer
item.description:
@Macoronizer wrote:

Yes, i did run my server. Yes, I think I portforward and I also tried uTorrent. I tried moparscape too, it didn’t work.

item.title: Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @alpha2 .alpha
item.description:
@alpha2 wrote:

Did you run your server? Did you portforward? I would also suggest using a different client than silab.

Read full topic
